trans-unit.source: The result returned by the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活动返回的结果。

trans-unit.source: An abstract class for creating a custom activity with imperative behavior defined in the <see cref="M:System.Activities.CodeActivity.Execute(System.Activities.CodeActivityContext)" /> method, giving access to variable and argument resolution and extensions.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象类，用于创建具有强制行为（该行为使用 <see cref="M:System.Activities.CodeActivity.Execute(System.Activities.CodeActivityContext)" /> 方法定义）的自定义活动，从而提供对变量和参数解析及扩展的访问。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can define a result value of the type specified in the type specifier of the class.
trans-unit.target: 派生类可以定义在该类的类型说明符中指定的类型的结果值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to derive a class from <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何从 <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601> 派生类。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates an instance of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，创建派生类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 创建并验证活动的自变量、变量、子活动和活动委托的说明。

trans-unit.source: Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 自定义活动作者可以在活动的 <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> 重写中提供验证逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 由 <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 这些异常将从对 <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未实现。

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="M:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata(System.Activities.CodeActivityMetadata)" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: 请改用 <see cref="M:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata(System.Activities.CodeActivityMetadata)" />。

trans-unit.source: Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: 自定义活动作者可以在活动的 <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> 重写中提供验证逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 由 <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 这些异常将从对 <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 活动的元数据，用于封装活动的自变量、变量、子活动和活动委托。

trans-unit.source: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 创建并验证活动的自变量、变量、子活动和活动委托的说明。

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage run-time relationships and lifetime rules.
trans-unit.target: 工作流运行时使用 <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> 的默认实现来确保工作流构造正确，以及管理运行时关系和生存期规则。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> examines the public members of the activity type using the type’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> 的默认实现使用活动类型的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> 来检查该类型的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: These public members are of type <xref:System.Activities.Argument>, <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, [IEnumerable\<Variable>](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), <xref:System.Activities.Activity>, [IEnumerable\<Activity>](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601), or <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: 这些公共成员的类型包括<xref:System.Activities.Argument>， <xref:System.Activities.Variable>， [IEnumerable\<变量 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)， <xref:System.Activities.Activity>， [IEnumerable\<活动 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601)，或<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to customize the building of the activity’s run-time description and to provide custom validation logic.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写此方法，以自定义活动的运行时说明的生成并提供自定义的验证逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 由 <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.CacheMetadata%2A> 引发的任何异常不会视为验证错误。

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 这些异常将从对 <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> 的调用中转义，并且必须由调用方进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The execution context under which the activity executes.
trans-unit.target: 执行活动时所处的执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, performs the execution of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，执行该活动。

trans-unit.source: The result of the activity’s execution.
trans-unit.target: 活动执行的结果。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting a value for this property returns a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 为此属性设置值会返回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601> does not allow defining the execution logic as an activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601> 不允许将执行逻辑定义为活动。

trans-unit.source: Instead the execution logic must be defined in the <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 而是必须通过 <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity%601.Execute%2A> 方法定义执行逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the implementation version of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置活动的实现版本。

trans-unit.source: The implementation version of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活动的实现版本。

trans-unit.source: The metadata.
trans-unit.target: 元数据。

trans-unit.source: The original activity.
trans-unit.target: 原始活动。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when creating a map for the dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: 为动态更新创建映射时，将引发事件。
